biotools.summary: a package for the mapping of short reads from illumina sequencing machines onto a reference genome. It uses a hybrid mapping algorithm and a detailed statistical model to achieve both speed and sensitivity, particularly when reads include sequence variation.

bioschemas.name: Stampy
